summary: Investigative reporter Ji-won begins to receive a series of menacing calls. To escape the terrifying and relentless clanging of the telephone, she changes her number and moves out. But the threatening campaign of terror continues unabated.
cast: Ha Ji-Won|Kim Yu-Mi|Woo-jae Choi|Ji-yeon Choi|Seo-woo Eun|Jeong-yun Choi|Seong-hwan Jeong
title: Phone
